data.title: Organizations Working With Girls Leadership
authors: Dorothy Ponton, Director of Marketing and Engagement
data.meta_description: Girls Leadership works with districts, public schools, charters, and independent schools across the country and internationally.
data.text:
Girls Leadership works with districts, public schools, charters, independent schools and community-based organizations across the country and internationally. If you want a professional development training curated to your needs, please Contact Us.
